```{r}
library(quantmod)
library(PerformanceAnalytics)

date <- "2019-3-2"    
TVClose <- getSymbols.yahoo("TV", from=date, auto.assign = F)[,6]


TVRets <- na.omit(dailyReturn(TVClose, type="log")) 
chartSeries(TVRets)
```
